'''Toy Matches''' is an exploration mechanic in [[Simulanka]]. This mechanic allows the player to attach a red [[Toy Blocks|Toy Block]] to its top and then use {{Pyro}} to set the red block on fire to turn it into a darker shade of red. This may be necessary when matching Toy Blocks of same shade of color.
